EVENT.RULES:
There will be two stages : First one will be of MCQ 'type' having 60 questions. Its duration will be one hour Second one will be of programming type , it will also be of one hour duration and will take place on the same day itself.
The second test will be for those who scores more than or equal to 50% in first test. The decision of the judge will be considered as final. Those students who want to register for the event have to pay Rs 20/- as registration fee. Students who have registered online have to confirm their registration and pay their registration fees 1hr before the start of the event.
Note : If a sufficient number of registrations are not received for the event, then the organizers
